You should look into the QuotaEnforcer module. That will allow you to specify Quotas on number of objects and number of bytes

The QuotaEnforcer is a pre-fetch-processor and contains (among others) these settings:

               <long name="group-max-fetch-successes">50</long>
               <long name="group-max-success-kb">-1</long>
               <long name="group-max-fetch-responses">-1</long>
               <long name="group-max-all-kb">-1</long>

The group is defined in the frontier section with:
<string name="queue-assignment-policy">HostnameQueueAssignmentPolicy</string>

The exsample will limit the number of succesfull fetches from each host to 50
